resources.string: This Treasure Hunter game was developed by Rishi and Ali for the CMPT 276 class at SFU(http://www.cs.sfu.ca/CourseCentral/276/bfraser/index.html)

Welcome to Treasure Hunter. To play the game press PLAY GAME on the main menu. Then select a tile to search for treasure, If you find a treasure an image of a gem will appear, otherwise a number will appear that shows you the amount of hidden treasure in the same row and column as the tile you just clicked. Find all the treasure to win!

Jewel Icon made by [http://www.flaticon.com/authors/madebyoliver] from www.flaticon.com, Rock and other game textures from [http://opengameart.org/content/29-grounds-and-walls-and-water-1024x1024]. Chest Icon made by [http://www.flaticon.com/authors/madebyoliver] from www.flaticon.com, Sounds generated using BFXR(http://www.bfxr.net/)
